column4: I just installed with the Desktop CD and am unable to get Updates..  I took screenshots during the entire process to show what is happening.  I do have an internet connection..  www.phunki.com/ubuntu for screenshots. Please Help
looks like you have no network connection, or the server is down.
i do have internet.. and the server isn't down.. if i type the path in firefox it works.. and downloads..  it is a problem with the update manager..
odd.
yes..  very..  plz keep looking...
nope...  i am behind router..  but it works ...
just a regular netgear router..  should that be a problem?
I doubt it.
i'm talking to you on the ubuntu install right now..
what is weird is that it knows that there are updates..  it just is unable to get them..  strange ehh?
aha. I take it you do have internet access.
yes..  on internet now.
what should I do?  any ideas?
this is my third install..  i've downloaded CD twice..  and checked it...
something is terribly wrong because the live CD is unable to download security updates aswell..  look at install-screenshot.png
sounds like the US server is having issues, or your internet connection is stuffed...
i've tried other servers..
what is another server i can try?
you sure your router's not blocking port 80?
what gnomefreak said.
ubotu is a bot!
